actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Dr. Honesto K. Fenol, Rosabella Montes-Fenol, and Lawrence Mark Fenol.

summary.text: Directs the Attorney General to: (1) suspend and withhold deportation of three named individuals for a two-year period on the condition that certain written assurances are made regarding the vocation of one of such individuals; and (2) adjust the status of such individuals to that of aliens lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence upon compliance with such assurances.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Dr. Honesto K. Fenol, Rosabella Montes-Fenol, and Lawrence Mark Fenol.
